column5: This year we will be hitting the border heading North on Friday mid-late afternoon. On the way back, it will be about 11-12 on Saturday. I suspect these are not the best times? What do you think?
Best boarder advice I heard in years! LOL <{{}}><
I think it's best to cross the border when you get there.
We cross about 1:00 on Friday afternoon and usually only 2-3 cars. We come home on Friday morning because my experience is that the border is a zoo on Saturday, not worth the hassle to me.

ever since the line was backed up the city limits of fort francis which was probably an 8 hour line we just go to baudette to cross coming back. 3 cars tops on a saturday and no hassle and no #### brdge toll either.
